constantValues: Vehicle or device included in a sales contract.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: buybackDate

constantValues: Last day for which the vehicle or device sold is eligible for buy back.

members.description: Last day for which the vehicle or device sold is eligible for buy back.

members.name: buybackValue

constantValues: The amount to be paid upon buy back.

members.description: The amount to be paid upon buy back.

members.name: buybackValueBase

constantValues: Value of the buyback value in base currency.

members.description: Value of the buyback value in base currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deviceId

constantValues: The vehicle or device purchased in this sales contract.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The vehicle or device purchased in this sales contract.

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: salesContractId

constantValues: The parent sales contract for this sale.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The parent sales contract for this sale.
